description: A police vehicle was hit by a Clear Creek County Roundabout shuttle bus stolen by a man and a woman. title: Police dog tracks down alleged car thief
description: A Cairns man who failed to return a rented Audi was tracked down by police dog, Duke, who led his handler and other officers to the alleged car thief. Queensland Police noted that the 39-year-old man had previously failed to stop for officers and drove away, but was later sniffed out in nearby bushland by their tenacious assistant. #policedog #rentalcar #thief #Queensland
